name: Skřítek: The Nemesis of Harvest
description:
Skřítek: The Nemesis Of Harvest

You play a Skřítek. A small monster that is trying to annoy woodcutters who are harvesting your forest for wood.

Skřítek's are mysterious monsters from Slavic mythology. By playing you'll not just throw rotten plums on woodworkers and demolish huts - but also learn a lot about these fascninating creatures. But don't forget to hide before they catch you. They will try to capture you!

A top down action game: WASD for movement and Mouse for aim&throwing plums.

This is a Ludum Dare 52 Compo game Used Software:
  • Godot
  • Aseprite (Art)
  • Bosca Ceoil (Music)
  • Chiptone (SFX)
